ItemRelic.description: The Aegis is the shield of Athena, Greek goddess of battle.  Can enchant shields only.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Aegis of Athena

option.retaliationSlowLifeLeach: 15.0% Chance of 14 ~ 22 Life Leech Retaliation over 1.0 Seconds

ItemRelic.description: Archimedes was one of the greatest of Greece's philosophers and scientists.  Can enchant shields only.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Archimedes' Mirror

ItemRelic.description: Artemis, the Greek goddess of the hunt, is renowned for her skill with the bow.  Can enchant bows only.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Artemis' Bowstring

ItemRelic.description: The drink of Dionysus, Greek god of wine and revelry, is a potent brew indeed.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Dionysus' Wineskin

ItemRelic.description: The Golden Fleece, sought after by Jason and his Argonauts, is rumored to hold great power as well as great beauty.  Can enchant torso armor only.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Golden Fleece

ItemRelic.description: Hecate is a mysterious Greek goddess associated with the moon, childbirth, and magic.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Hecate's Crescent

ItemRelic.description: Herakles was the strongest of all the Greek heroes.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Herakles' Might

ItemRelic.description: Hermes the Messenger is the swiftest of the Greek gods.  He is known for his iconic winged sandals.  Can enchant leg armor only.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Hermes' Sandal

ItemRelic.description: Prometheus, son of the titan Iapetus, gave the gift of fire to mankind.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Prometheus' Flame

ItemRelic.description: Achilles was the greatest of all the Greek warriors of the Trojan War.  His strength and speed in battle were legendary.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Valor of Achilles

ItemRelic.description: Zeus is the mightiest of the gods of Olympus.  The thunderbolt is his weapon and symbol.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Zeus' Thunderbolt

ItemRelic.description: Amun-Ra, ruler of the sun, is the greatest of the Egyptian gods.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Amun-Ra's Glory

ItemRelic.description: Isis is queen of the Egyptian gods.  Her symbol, the ankh, is associated with healing and immortality.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Ankh of Isis

ItemRelic.description: Anubis, a jackal-headed god, is ruler of the Egyptian underworld.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Anubis' Wrath

properties.offensiveLifeLeech: 2% of Attack damage converted to Health
4% of Attack damage converted to Health
6% of Attack damage converted to Health

ItemRelic.description: The Djed is the backbone of Osiris, lord of the dead.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Djed of Osiris

ItemRelic.description: Set is the Egyptian god of evil.  In an attempt to take control of the throne of the gods, Set turned on his brother Osiris, brutally hacking the latter's body apart and scattering the pieces across the land.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Set's Betrayal

ItemRelic.description: The Udjat is the eye of Horus, hawk-headed god of the sky.  It symbolizes protection and power.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Udjat of Horus

ItemRelic.description: Hammurabi, king of Babylon, was revered for bringing justice to his people with his code of laws.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Code of Hammurabi

ItemRelic.description: The Dragon-Kings are the masters of water in China.  Ocean, rain, lake, and river - all are theirs to command.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Domain of the Dragon-Kings

ItemRelic.description: True to the tenets of Taoism, even Guan-Yu, the Taoist god of war, only fights when all other options have been exhausted.  Can enchant torso armor only.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Guan-Yu's Grace

ItemRelic.description: The Jade Emperor is the ruler of the Chinese gods.  He is a contemplative deity who rarely interferes with the affairs of god or man.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Jade Emperor's Serenity

ItemRelic.description: Li-Nezha, a Chinese trickster god, is as nimble as he is crafty.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Li-Nezha's Guile

ItemRelic.description: The Monkey King, the most mischievous of all the Chinese gods, is also one of the most powerful.  His cunning has lured many an unwary foe to do his bidding.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Monkey King's Trickery

ItemRelic.description: Shen-Nong is the Chinese god of plants and medicine. He is a master of herbs - and not all are meant to cure.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Shen-Nong's Dark Medicine

ItemRelic.description: Yen-Lo-Wang is a god of Death and the ruler of Feng-Du, the Chinese Hell.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Yen-Lo-Wang's Bloodletting

ItemRelic.description: The Aegis is the shield of Athena, Greek goddess of battle.  Can enchant shields only.
ItemRelic.name: Embodiment of the Aegis of Athena

option.retaliationSlowLifeLeach: 15.0% Chance of 24 ~ 36 Life Leech Retaliation over 1.0 Seconds

ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Archimedes' Mirror

ItemRelic.description: Artemis, the Greek goddess of the hunt, is renowned for her skill with the bow.  Can enchant bows only.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Artemis' Bowstring

ItemRelic.description: The drink of Dionysus, Greek god of wine and revelry, is a potent brew indeed.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Dionysus' Wineskin

ItemRelic.description: The Golden Fleece, sought after by Jason and his Argonauts, is rumored to hold great power as well as great beauty.  Can enchant torso armor only.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Golden Fleece

ItemRelic.description: Hecate is a mysterious Greek goddess associated with the moon, childbirth, and magic.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Hecate's Crescent

ItemRelic.description: Herakles was the strongest of all the Greek heroes.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Herakles' Might

ItemRelic.description: Hermes the Messenger is the swiftest of the Greek gods.  He is known for his iconic winged sandals.  Can enchant leg armor only.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Hermes' Sandal

ItemRelic.description: Prometheus, son of the titan Iapetus, gave the gift of fire to mankind.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Prometheus' Flame

ItemRelic.description: Achilles was the greatest of all the Greek warriors of the Trojan War.  His strength and speed in battle were legendary.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Valor of Achilles

ItemRelic.description: Zeus is the mightiest of the gods of Olympus.  The thunderbolt is his weapon and symbol.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Zeus' Thunderbolt

ItemRelic.description: Amun-Ra, ruler of the sun, is the greatest of the Egyptian gods.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Amun-Ra's Glory

ItemRelic.description: Isis is queen of the Egyptian gods.  Her symbol, the ankh, is associated with healing and immortality.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Ankh of Isis

ItemRelic.description: Anubis, a jackal-headed god, is ruler of the Egyptian underworld.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Anubis' Wrath

properties.offensiveLifeLeech: 4% of Attack damage converted to Health
8% of Attack damage converted to Health
12% of Attack damage converted to Health

ItemRelic.description: The Djed is the backbone of Osiris, lord of the dead.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Djed of Osiris

ItemRelic.description: Set is the Egyptian god of evil.  In an attempt to take control of the throne of the gods, Set turned on his brother Osiris, brutally hacking the latter's body apart and scattering the pieces across the land.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Set's Betrayal

ItemRelic.description: The Udjat is the eye of Horus, hawk-headed god of the sky.  It symbolizes protection and power.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Udjat of Horus

ItemRelic.description: Hammurabi, king of Babylon, was revered for bringing justice to his people with his code of laws.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Code of Hammurabi

ItemRelic.description: The Dragon-Kings are the masters of water in China.  Ocean, rain, lake, and river - all are theirs to command.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Domain of the Dragon-Kings

ItemRelic.description: True to the tenets of Taoism, even Guan-Yu, the Taoist god of war, only fights when all other options have been exhausted.  Can enchant torso armor only.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Guan-Yu's Grace

ItemRelic.description: The Jade Emperor is the ruler of the Chinese gods.  He is a contemplative deity who rarely interferes with the affairs of god or man.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Jade Emperor's Serenity

ItemRelic.description: Li-Nezha, a Chinese trickster god, is as nimble as he is crafty.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Li-Nezha's Guile

ItemRelic.description: The Monkey King, the most mischievous of all the Chinese gods, is also one of the most powerful.  His cunning has lured many an unwary foe to do his bidding.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Monkey King's Trickery

ItemRelic.description: Shen-Nong is the Chinese god of plants and medicine. He is a master of herbs - and not all are meant to cure.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Shen-Nong's Dark Medicine

ItemRelic.description: Yen-Lo-Wang is a god of Death and the ruler of Feng-Du, the Chinese Hell.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Yen-Lo-Wang's Bloodletting

ItemRelic.description: Thanatos, the incarnation of death, carries a sword with the power to rend the very souls of mere mortals.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Blade of Thanatos

ItemRelic.description: In the deepest pits of the underworld lies Tartarus.  Cold as the grave and swathed in darkness, it is here that punishment is meted out for those mortals foolish enough to oppose the will of the gods.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Chill of Tartarus

ItemRelic.description: Although not as strong or swift as the other heroes of legend, Odysseus' formidable guile made him a match for any foe.  Can enchant head armor only.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Cunning of Odysseus

ItemRelic.description: Numbered among the greatest of the heroes of the Trojan war, Ajax was known not only for the strength of his arm, but even more for his indomitable spirit.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Iron Will of Ajax

ItemRelic.description: Persephone, favored daughter of the earth goddess Demeter, was forced into marriage with Hades.  She now shares rule of the underworld, yet it brings her only sorrow.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Persephone's Tears

ItemRelic.description: Ares, the Greek god of war, is venerated and feared in equal measure.  He is cruel, vengeful, and nearly mad - only a fool would risk his wrath.  Can enchant armbands and bracelets.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Rage of Ares

ItemRelic.description: Hector, prince of Troy, was renowned for his noble spirit and steadfast nature.  He fell defending his homeland, mourned even by his enemies.  Can enchant all shields.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Shade of Hector

ItemRelic.description: Thanatos, the incarnation of death, carries a sword with the power to rend the very souls of mere mortals.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Embodiment of the Blade of Thanatos

ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Shade of Hector

ItemRelic.description: Cernunnos is the enigmatic Celtic lord of nature, a serene ruler with an antlered head.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Cernunnos' Majesty

ItemRelic.description: Donar, or Thor, is the Germanic god of thunder. A son of giants himself, he uses his mighty hammer to protect the world from all kinds of monsters.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Donar's Hammer

ItemRelic.description: Epona is one of the most widely venerated goddesses of the Celts, protector of their horses and fertility.  Can enchant leg armor only.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Epona's Horses

ItemRelic.description: Belenus is the Celtic god of the sun and the patron of healing springs.  Can enchant shields and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Light of Belenus

ItemRelic.description: A part of the mistletoe infused with the power of the pagan earth goddess.  Can enchant all weapons.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Power of Nerthus

ItemRelic.description: The Celtic god Ogmios uses the power of persuasion to turn others into his willing servants.  Can enchant amulets or head armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Ogmios' Eloquence

ItemRelic.description: Sigurd the dragon slayer was the hero of the VÃ¶lsung clan, famous for his bravery and ambition.  Can enchant all armor.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Sigurd's Courage

ItemRelic.description: Every evening in Valhalla, the stew for the Einherjar's feast is prepared in a mighty cauldron out of the same resurrecting beast.  Can enchant torso armor only.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Stew of Eldhrimnir

ItemRelic.description: No price, not even trading one of his eyes, seems too great in the Allfather's never-ending search for knowledge.  Can enchant armor and jewellery.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Wodan's Wisdom

ItemRelic.description: After the war with the gods, the titan Atlas was condemned to bear the heavens upon his shoulders for all eternity. {}{}Can enhance rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Atlas' Endurance

ItemRelic.description: Hesperos, brother of Atlas, is the star of the magical time of dusk and progenitor of the Hesperides. {}{}Can enhance rings and amulets.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Star of the Evening

ItemRelic.description: Okeanos is the primordial, neutral titan representing all water, and father of over three thousand Okeanides. {}{}Can enchant torso armor or shields.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Children of Okeanos

ItemRelic.description: The Cyclopes who crafted Zeus' Thunderbolt also gifted his brother with a magical trident. {}{}Can enhance arm armor only.
ItemRelic.name: Essence of Poseidon's Trident

OneShot_Scroll.description: Opens a conduit of pure energy that flows from the celestial planes into the caster, granting them improved control over their mystical powers.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Arcane Power

OneShot_Scroll.description: Calls upon a mighty Cyclops to do the caster's bidding.Â  Due to the iron will of the Cyclops, however, mastery of this fearsome being can only be held for a short time.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Cyclops

OneShot_Scroll.description: Calls on the power of the skies to rain fury upon nearby enemies.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Sky's Rage

OneShot_Scroll.description: Creates a field of energy that weakens the defenses of enemies caught inside.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Vulnerability

OneShot_Scroll.description: Inspires the caster, greatly improving their offensive capabilities in melee combat.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Warrior's Song

OneShot_Scroll.description: Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Breaking Wheel

OneShot_Scroll.description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Crushing Vortex

OneShot_Scroll.description: Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Elemental Shielding

OneShot_Scroll.description: Blasts surrounding enemies with a wave of energy that saps their physical strength, greatly reducing their ability to deal damage with most weapons.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Frailty

OneShot_Scroll.description: Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Frenzy

OneShot_Scroll.description: Sends a blast of bitter cold air out from the caster's location.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Ice Nova

OneShot_Scroll.description: Summons a pair of powerful Harpy witches.Â  Using fierce lightning attacks, these fearsome beasts devastate enemies from a distance.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Storm Witches

OneShot_Scroll.description: Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Stalwart Alliance

OneShot_Scroll.description: Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Unbroken Fortitude

OneShot_Scroll.description: Summons a mighty Djinn spellcaster.Â  Though powerful in war, the Djinn is also valuable for the mystical enhancements it provides for the caster and their allies.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Djinn

OneShot_Scroll.description: Sends shockwaves of force through the surrounding ground, damaging and stunning any nearby enemies.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Earthquake

OneShot_Scroll.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Necromancer

OneShot_Scroll.description: Lays down a field of vampiric energy.  The life force of any enemies who cross into this field will be ripped from their souls and transferred to the caster.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of Vampirism

OneShot_Scroll.description: Lashes out in fiery retaliation each time the caster is struck by a melee attack.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of Vengeance

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Breaking Wheel

OneShot_Scroll.description: Grants the caster improved control over their inner powers, allowing them to use their skills more quickly and more effectively.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of the Archmage's Fury

OneShot_Scroll.description: Rips the very fabric of the universe asunder, devastating all who enter its area of influence.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of Armageddon

OneShot_Scroll.description: Grants the caster improved reflexes, allowing them to dodge most incoming projectiles.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of the Arrow Dancer

OneShot_Scroll.description: Summons an enormous demonic beast from the netherworld.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of the Behemoth

OneShot_Scroll.description: Summons the avatar of a mad god.  Although control can only be maintained for a short while, the god can wreak havoc in even this short time span.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of the Maddened God

OneShot_Scroll.description: Turns the inner power of surrounding enemies against them, burning their bodies with the power of their own magic.
OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of Magebane

tagMonsterName1326.description: The ominous call on this ancient heirloom will summon forth ghostly heroes of old from the Elysian Fields to do battle once more.
tagMonsterName1326.name: Ancestral Warrior

tagSkillName001.description: Provides physical conditioning and discipline that will allow your character to master the skills of a warrior.
tagSkillName001.name: Warfare Mastery

tagSkillName002.description: Each enemy hit has a chance of sending you into a battle rage that adds bonus damage to attacks and increases Offensive Ability for a short duration.
tagSkillName002.name: Battle Rage

tagSkillName003.description: Provides a chance for attacks to cause bonus damage while in Battle Rage.
tagSkillName003.name: Crushing Blow

tagSkillName003-1.description: Cyclops' Club Slam - FAN for proj height
tagSkillName003-1.name: Crushing Blow

tagSkillName004.description: Provides a chance to counter attack an enemy after being hit in Battle Rage.
tagSkillName004.name: Counter Attack

tagSkillName005.description: When used as your default weapon attack, Onslaught charges up as you hit enemies causing increased damage.  The first hit always charges Onslaught to the first level of the skill and it continues to charge until it reaches your current skill level. Onslaught dissipates rapidly when not attacking.  Assign this skill to your left mouse button.
tagSkillName005.name: Onslaught

tagSkillName006.description: You build momentum as you drive your attack forward, attacking and moving more rapidly.
tagSkillName006.name: Ardor

tagSkillName007.description: Total focus in the heat of battle allows you to ignore physical and piercing damage.
tagSkillName007.name: Ignore Pain

tagSkillName008.description: A Dual Wield technique that hits up to 3 adjacent enemies.
tagSkillName008.name: Tumult

tagSkillName010.description: Learn to effectively wield two weapons and perform occasional double attacks or throws.
tagSkillName010.name: Dual Wield

tagSkillName012.description: A Dual Wield melee strike that hits one target with both weapons.
tagSkillName012.name: Hew

tagSkillName014.description: Executes a devastating spinning attack that can damage up to four enemies.  Initially each hit is not as powerful as a normal attack but the effectiveness increases every level.
tagSkillName014.name: War Wind

tagSkillName015.description: Adds bleeding damage to War Wind and increases the number of enemies hit.  Requires at least one sword, axe, or spear.
tagSkillName015.name: Lacerate

tagSkillName016.description: The triumphant call of your war horn temporarily stuns enemies.
tagSkillName016.name: War Horn

tagSkillName017.description: Years of training with the sword, axe, and club allow you to attack faster and more accurately, and also grant some proficiency in throwing them.
tagSkillName017.name: Weapon Training

tagSkillName018.description: Provides the mental control and spiritual focus to unfetter your mind of earthly concerns and learn to harness the elemental power of weather.
tagSkillName018.name: Storm Mastery

tagSkillName019.description: When activated, each enemy hit has a chance of unleashing a violent squall of storm energy.
tagSkillName019.name: Storm Surge

tagSkillName020.description: Hurls a ball of electrical energy that damages and stuns enemies in a small blast radius.
tagSkillName020.name: Thunderball

tagSkillName021.description: Enhances the power of Thunderball causing sparks to leap from the initial explosion.  Each spark that hits an enemy inflicts lightning damage and stuns.
tagSkillName021.name: Concussive Blast

tagSkillName022.description: Projects a deadly shard of ice at the target inflicting cold damage and temporarily slowing them.
tagSkillName022.name: Ice Shard

tagSkillName025.description: Calls down a powerful bolt of lightning from the heavens to decimate your target.
tagSkillName025.name: Lightning Bolt

tagSkillName025-1.description: Calls down a powerful bolt of lightning from the heavens to decimate your target.
tagSkillName025-1.name: Lightning Bolt

tagSkillName026.description: Causes electricity to leap from the target of your Lightning Bolt skill and strike additional nearby enemies.
tagSkillName026.name: Chain Lightning

tagSkillName026-1.description: Causes electricity to leap from the target of your Lightning Bolt skill and strike additional nearby enemies.
tagSkillName026-1.name: Chain Lightning

tagSkillName032.description: Assaults the minds of surrounding enemies with images of their own death causing the weak-hearted to flee in horror and more resolute foes to fight less effectively.

tagSkillName035.description: A deathly chill radiates from the character slowing the attack and movement of enemies as it diminishes their life.
tagSkillName035.name: Deathchill Aura

tagSkillName036.description: Accelerates the effects of time on adjacent enemies' equipment causing weapons to dull and armor to crumble.
tagSkillName036.name: Ravages of Time

tagSkillName037.description: Weakens the constitution of adjacent enemies making them more susceptible to attacks that directly damage their life such as vitality damage and life leaching.
tagSkillName037.name: Necrosis

tagSkillName039.description: Places a magical ward on the player that protects them from death by granting additional life when their life gets dangerously low.
tagSkillName039.name: Death Ward

tagSkillName042.description: Allows the Liche King to create an explosion of negative energy that damages enemy's constitution making them more susceptible to all forms of damage.
tagSkillName042.name: Soul Blight

tagSkillName045.description: In ages past, powerful sorcerers learned how to cheat Hades and persist as undead liches long after death had robbed their bodies of life.  A dangerous practice of Theurgists is to bind the souls of these ancient liches to their will, thus acquiring their powers.
tagSkillName045.name: Summon Liche King

tagSkillName046.description: Draw upon even greater otherworldly powers to augment yourself and allies in battle, but be wary of the cost exacted from your own vitality.
tagSkillName046.name: Unearthly Power

tagSkillName048.description: Summons a totem that holds a powerful spirit, infusing you and all allies with great mental energy while standing close to it.
tagSkillName048.name: Circle of Power

tagSkillName048-1.description: Summons a totem that holds a powerful spirit, infusing you and all allies with great mental energy while standing close to it.
tagSkillName048-1.name: Circle of Power

tagSkillName050.description: Provides the physical conditioning and secret knowledge necessary to train as a rogue.
tagSkillName050.name: Rogue Mastery

tagSkillName051.description: With a deep knowledge of anatomy, attacks can be directed at vital points in the body increasing the chance and effectiveness of bleed damage.
tagSkillName051.name: Anatomy

tagSkillName052.description: Throw a piercing blade at your opponent capable of causing prolonged bleeding.
tagSkillName052.name: Throwing Knife

tagSkillName053.description: While active, this skill ensures that any bladed weapons used by yourself and allies will remain razor sharp and inflict increased piercing damage.
tagSkillName053.name: Blade Honing

tagSkillName054.description: Used in place of your normal attack, every fourth hit with calculated strike will deliver increased damage.  Assign this skill to your left mouse button.
tagSkillName054.name: Calculated Strike

tagSkillName055.description: Adds a chance for poison to cloud an enemy's mind, sending them into a state of confusion.
tagSkillName055.name: Mandrake

tagSkillName065.description: Grants the inner harmony and patience necessary to learn the language of wild creatures and master the hidden power of nature.
tagSkillName065.name: Nature Mastery

tagSkillName068.description: A protective grove of briars grows around you that enemies cannot pass through.
tagSkillName068.name: Briar Ward

tagSkillName072.description: A wave of healing energy rapidly restores lost life to the target ally.
tagSkillName072.name: Regrowth

tagSkillName074.description: Subtracts time from recharging skills allowing you to use them more frequently.
tagSkillName074.name: Refresh

tagSkillName075.description: Allows Regrowth to be cast more frequently.
tagSkillName075.name: Accelerated Growth

tagSkillName076.description: Imparts the predatory spirit and cunning necessary to learn the arts of hunting.
tagSkillName076.name: Hunting Mastery

tagSkillName077.description: Central to survival in the wilderness is the ability to hunt with bow, spear or thrown objects.  Great familiarity with these traditional weapons allows you to wield them with exceptional speed and grace.
tagSkillName077.name: Wood Lore

tagSkillName078.description: Barbed hooks on the hunter's Ensnare net tear into enemies as they struggle causing them to bleed.
tagSkillName078.name: Barbed Netting

tagSkillName079.description: Those who answer the call of the hunt will fight with increased speed and cunning.
tagSkillName079.name: Call of the Hunt

tagSkillName079-1.description: Those who answer the call of the hunt will fight with increased speed and cunning.
tagSkillName079-1.name: Call of the Hunt

tagSkillName081.description: Casts a weighted net around the feet of an enemy holding them in place but not preventing them from attacking if you are within their range.
tagSkillName081.name: Ensnare

tagSkillName083.description: Drops a mechanical bolt trap that will trip when enemies draw near and rapidly fire out deadly bolts.
tagSkillName083.name: Lay Trap

tagSkillName084.description: Hunting experience gives you the edge when facing familiar quarry such as Animals and Beastmen.
tagSkillName084.name: Art of the Hunt

tagSkillName087.description: Expertise in assembling traps reduces the amount of time it takes to create a new trap after one has been set.
tagSkillName087.name: Rapid Construction

tagSkillName088.description: Take full advantage of your enemy's mistakes and vulnerable moments to inflict savage wounds.
tagSkillName088.name: Exploit Weakness

tagSkillName089.description: A brutal thrust from your spear delivers devastating piercing damage to enemies and diminishes a portion of your enemy's total life.
tagSkillName089.name: Take Down

tagSkillName090.description: Targeting vital weak-points on your enemy causes sustained damage from bleeding.
tagSkillName090.name: Eviscerate

tagSkillName091.description: Living off the land, you learn to identify and utilize medicinal plants to create healing salves.  When applied it will fortify against poison and healing is accelerated for a duration.
tagSkillName091.name: Herbal Remedy

tagSkillName093.description: Grants those who follow the hunt endurance to relentlessly track their quarry, preventing even the most tangled thicket from slowing pursuit.
tagSkillName093.name: Trail Blazing

tagSkillName094.description: Making use of available cover as you press your attack allows you to avoid unnecessary damage.
tagSkillName094.name: Find Cover

tagSkillName095.description: By observing your prey from a distance you may discover its weakness, resulting in greater pierce damage.
tagSkillName095.name: Study Prey

tagSkillName096.description: Draw your enemies into the open, making them more vulnerable to attack.
tagSkillName096.name: Flush Out

tagSkillName097.description: Drops down a decoy to attract the attention of nearby monsters.
tagSkillName097.name: Monster Lure

tagSkillName098.description: Trains your mind and spirit in ancient techniques that will enable you to draw power from the Earth and gain mastery over rock and fire.
tagSkillName098.name: Earth Mastery

tagSkillName100.description: Tempers armor, increasing protection and fire resistance while under the effects of Earth Enchantment.
tagSkillName100.name: Stone Skin

tagSkillName100-1.description: Tempers armor, increasing protection and fire resistance while under the effects of Earth Enchantment.
tagSkillName100-1.name: Stone Skin

tagSkillName103.description: Increases the damage and number of flame jets created by Flame Surge.
tagSkillName103.name: Flame Arch

tagSkillName104.description: Boosts the physical damage of attacks and provides a chance of causing critical fire damage while under the effects of Earth Enchantment.
tagSkillName104.name: Brimstone

tagSkillName105.description: Imbues your weapons and the weapons of nearby allies with the power of rock and flame.
tagSkillName105.name: Earth Enchantment

tagSkillName106.description: Causes the Volcanic Orb to violently explode on impact sending out fragments of rock that each inflict physical damage to the enemies they hit.
tagSkillName106.name: Fragmentation

tagSkillName109.description: Volcanic fissures form in the ground, emitting deadly geysers of molten flame and fiery chunks of brimstone.  Each fragment inflicts physical and fire damage to the enemies it hits.
tagSkillName109.name: Eruption

tagSkillName110.description: Encircles you in a searing ring of flames burning all enemies that come within its radius.
tagSkillName110.name: Ring of Flame

tagSkillName110-1.description: Encircles you in a searing ring of flames burning all enemies that come within its radius.
tagSkillName110-1.name: Ring of Flame

tagSkillName111.description: An impervious layer of rock envelops you for a short duration boosting regeneration but prohibiting movement.
tagSkillName111.name: Stone Form

tagSkillName112.description: Draws forth a powerful elemental guardian from the Earth's fiery depths.
tagSkillName112.name: Summon Core Dweller

tagSkillName113.description: Three jets of flame erupt from the caster's hands each inflicting incinerating fire damage to enemies.
tagSkillName113.name: Flame Surge

tagSkillName113-2.description: Three jets of flame erupt from the caster's hands each inflicting incinerating fire damage to enemies.
tagSkillName113-2.name: Flame Surge

tagSkillName114.description: Lobs a burning orb of fiery brimstone that explodes when it hits the ground inflicting fire and physical damage to enemies in a small radius.
tagSkillName114.name: Volcanic Orb

tagSkillName114-1.description: Lobs a burning orb of fiery brimstone that explodes when it hits the ground inflicting fire and physical damage to enemies in a small radius.
tagSkillName114-1.name: Volcanic Orb

tagSkillName115.description: Allows the Core Dweller to ignite an area of ground causing severe burn damage to enemies within.
tagSkillName115.name: Wildfire

tagSkillName116.description: Provides the fortitude and strength to master skills for the protection of yourself and others.
tagSkillName116.name: Defense Mastery

tagSkillName117.description: Each enemy hit has a chance of triggering an adrenaline rush that boosts life regeneration.
tagSkillName117.name: Adrenaline

tagSkillName120.description: A strong shield arm allows you to block multiple attackers with amazing speed when necessary but it can only be kept up for a short time.
tagSkillName120.name: Quick Recovery

tagSkillName121.description: Understanding how to properly adjust and move in armor allows you to wear heavier armor and shields than an untrained warrior of equivalent strength could manage.
tagSkillName121.name: Armor Handling

tagSkillName122.description: The resolute call of your horn can turn the tide of battle, inspiring all in its range to fight with renewed vitality.
tagSkillName122.name: Rally

tagSkillName123.description: Gradually restores lost energy to allies allowing them to continue the fight.
tagSkillName123.name: Inspiration

tagSkillName124.description: A percentage of all damage inflicted by enemies will be revisited back upon them for a short duration after using Rally.
tagSkillName124.name: Defiance

tagSkillName125.description: A shield fighting technique that inflicts damage with both the weapon and the shield.
tagSkillName125.name: Shield Smash

tagSkillName127.description: A fighting technique that utilizes the shield to slam into enemies, knocking them senseless.
tagSkillName127.name: Pulverize

tagSkillName128.description: Enter a state of heightened awareness that allows you and your nearby allies to perceive and respond to attacks more effectively.
tagSkillName128.name: Battle Awareness

tagSkillName129.description: Focus allows you and your allies to react quickly to enemy attacks increasing the chance of a successful shield block.
tagSkillName129.name: Focus

tagSkillName130.description: Grants allies the resolve to hold out against great adversity.
tagSkillName130.name: Iron Will

tagSkillName132.description: Increases how often an Adrenaline rush can be triggered.
tagSkillName132.name: Resilience

tagSkillName133.description: A shield attack that hits for increased damage and slows enemies' attacks for a duration.
tagSkillName133.name: Batter

tagSkillName134.description: Increases the effectiveness of Batter causing it to hit three targets with enough force to dent their armor.
tagSkillName134.name: Rend Armor

tagSkillName135.description: Assume the form of a towering Colossus and lay waste to your enemies.
tagSkillName135.name: Colossus Form

tagSkillName137.description: A running attack that slams into the enemy with your shield causing bonus damage and stunning them.
tagSkillName137.name: Shield Charge

tagSkillName138.description: Your War Horn heralds the doom of your enemies, shattering their nerves and reducing their ability to defend themselves.
tagSkillName138.name: Doom Horn

tagSkillName139.description: The ominous call on this ancient heirloom will summon forth ghostly heroes of old from the Elysian Fields to do battle once more.
tagSkillName139.name: Ancestral Horn

tagSkillName141.description: Plague afflicts nearby enemies with a debilitating ailment that reduces their health and quickly spreads to other nearby creatures.
tagSkillName141.name: Plague

tagSkillName143.description: Learn to throw additional knives at once and cut down enemies with a lethal flurry of razor-sharp metal.
tagSkillName143.name: Flurry of Knives

tagSkillName149.description: Summon an immortal Storm Wisp from the atmosphere to battle your enemies.
tagSkillName149.name: Summon Wisp

tagSkillName151.description: Creates a wind storm in the target area that decreases the projectile attack accuracy of enemies caught within it.
tagSkillName151.name: Squall

tagSkillName152.description: Adds retaliation fire damage to Stone Form.
tagSkillName152.name: Molten Rock

tagSkillName154.description: Provokes enemies to draw their attention away from allies.
tagSkillName154.name: Provoke

tagSkillName154-1.description: Provokes enemies to draw their attention away from allies.
tagSkillName154-1.name: Provoke

tagSkillName155.description: Mysterious otherworldly entities offer great power to Spirit Masters who can commune with them.  The cost, however, is measured in life.
tagSkillName155.name: Dark Covenant

tagSkillName156.description: A pulse of negatively charged energy dispels hostile enchantments on allies or, when cast on enemies, breaks their beneficial enchantments and negates a portion of their energy.  This attack inflicts bonus damage when used against Magical creatures.
tagSkillName156.name: Spell Breaker

tagSkillName157.name: Spell Shock

tagSkillName158.description: Summons a powerful forest Nymph who can bring down enemies with her magical bow and cast enchantments to strengthen allies in battle.
tagSkillName158.name: Sylvan Nymph

tagSkillName159.description: Summons a wolf companion to fight with you in battle.  At higher levels more wolves can be controlled at once.
tagSkillName159.name: Call of the Wild

tagSkillName160.description: Bolsters the life-force of yourself and nearby allies.
tagSkillName160.name: Heart of Oak

tagSkillName161.description: Provides a chance to use skills at 50% reduced energy cost while under the effect of Heart of Oak.
tagSkillName161.name: Tranquility of Water

tagSkillName162.description: Protects allies from the elements, reducing the damage caused by elemental based attacks.
tagSkillName162.name: Permanence of Stone

tagSkillName169.description: Marksmanship skill allows you to fire or throw projectiles that fly faster and increase pierce damage.  {}{}Assign this skill to your left mouse button.
tagSkillName169.name: Marksmanship

tagSkillName170.description: Incorporating a more streamlined shaft into your arrows allows them to pass through targets and hit additional enemies in their path.
tagSkillName170.name: Puncture Shot Arrows

tagSkillName171.description: A secret of master fletchers is the ability to craft special arrow heads that burst on impact sending out razor-sharp fragments in all directions.
tagSkillName171.name: Scatter Shot Arrows

tagSkillName172.description: A combat technique that uses the spear or bow to inflict deep wounds that will result in prolonged bleeding.
tagSkillName172.name: Gouge

tagSkillName173.description: A combat technique that uses the spear, bow or throwing weapons to rapidly strike three times.
tagSkillName173.name: Volley

tagSkillName174.description: Throw down a mighty standard to embolden the hearts of nearby allies.
tagSkillName174.name: Battle Standard

tagSkillName174-1.description: Throw down a mighty standard to embolden the hearts of nearby allies.
tagSkillName174-1.name: Battle Standard

tagSkillName177.description: A gnawing attack that rends enemy flesh causing bleed damage for a short duration.
tagSkillName177.name: Maul

tagSkillName180.description: Creates a shield of energy that will nullify incoming damage from elemental attacks.
tagSkillName180.name: Energy Shield

tagSkillName181.description: Gives Energy Shield the ability to reflect a portion of enemy attack damage back at them.
tagSkillName181.name: Reflection

tagSkillName182.description: Intense heat from the Ring of Flame softens the metal of enemy armor and weapons, decreasing their effectiveness.
tagSkillName182.name: Soften Metal

tagSkillName183.description: Enhanced by the volatile energy of the Earth, your fire attacks have a chance of inflicting greatly increased damage.
tagSkillName183.name: Volativity

tagSkillName184.description: Casts a protective heat shield on the target that absorbs damage, especially from fire.
tagSkillName184.name: Heat Shield

tagSkillName186.description: Saps the strength from diseased enemies causing them to move more slowly and fight less effectively.
tagSkillName186.name: Fatigue

tagSkillName187.description: Weakens the constitution of adjacent enemies making them more susceptible to physical and elemental damage.
tagSkillName187.name: Susceptibility

tagSkillName188.description: Allows the Nymph to create a living shield around allies that absorbs damage and harms enemies that strike it.
tagSkillName188.name: Overgrowth

tagSkillName190.description: Causes enemies who hit the Briar Ward to suffer poisoning.
tagSkillName190.name: Stinging Nettle

tagSkillName191.description: The howl of your wolves emboldens the hearts of those who hear it causing them to fight more fiercely.
tagSkillName191.name: Strength of the Pack

tagSkillName192.description: Even the sturdiest armor has its chinks.  The best way to stay alive is to not get hit.
tagSkillName192.name: Dodge Attacks

tagSkillName192-1.description: Even the sturdiest armor has its chinks.  The best way to stay alive is to not get hit.
tagSkillName192-1.name: Dodge Attacks

tagSkillName193.description: Adds a hidden explosive charge to the monster lure causing it to detonate when destroyed.  In order to detonate the lure must be at full energy.
tagSkillName193.name: Detonate

tagSkillName194.description: Lobs a bomb that will burst on impact releasing a cloud of toxic gas that damages enemies and impairs their attacks.
tagSkillName194.name: Poison Gas Bomb

tagSkillName197.description: Stuns victims of Lethal Strike and greatly magnifies the impact of poison and bleeding damage caused by the attack.
tagSkillName197.name: Mortal Wound

tagSkillName198.description: Expertise with traps and magical devices allows the Rogue to easily disable them and avoid their damage.
tagSkillName198.name: Disarm Traps

tagSkillName202-1.description: Calls forth a powerful extra-dimensional entity from beyond the ether.  The link can only be maintained for a short time.
tagSkillName202-1.name: Summon Outsider

tagSkillName203.description: Adds a chance for attacks to stun enemies and increases the duration of stun attacks when wielding a club or axe.
tagSkillName203.name: Concussive Blow

tagSkillName203-1.description: Adds a chance for attacks to stun enemies and increases the duration of stun attacks when wielding a club or axe.
tagSkillName203-1.name: Concussive Blow

tagSkillName204.description: Encases enemies in ice, immobilizing them but also making them more difficult to damage.
tagSkillName204.name: Freezing Blast

tagSkillName209.description: Leaches life from an enemy to replenish your own.
tagSkillName209.name: Life Drain

tagSkillName213.name: Ternion Attack

tagSkillName214.description: The magic practitioners of older civilizations devised many insidious techniques to bolster the destructive capabilities of their magical staves.  Knowledge of these methods will unlock the true power of your staff attacks.
tagSkillName214.name: Arcane Lore

tagSkillName215.description: Reduced visibility inside the Squall makes it difficult for enemies to effectively attack or defend themselves.
tagSkillName215.name: Obscured Visibility

tagSkillName216.description: Strikes with otherworldly energy that has the power to sear an enemy's spirit from the very fabric of reality.
tagSkillName216.name: Ether Strike

tagSkillName217.name: Spectral Bolt

x2tagSkillRunesName001.description: Learn the secrets of the runes and train to harness the fury of battle for your magic.
x2tagSkillRunesName001.name: Rune Mastery

x2tagSkillRunesName002.description: An arcane weapon technique that channels the power of thunder, hitting multiple enemies with staggering force.
x2tagSkillRunesName002.name: Thunder Strike

x2tagSkillRunesName003.description: Unleash the full force of the thunderbolt to electrocute and daze enemies across a wide area.
x2tagSkillRunesName003.name: Unleash

x2tagSkillRunesName005.description: Weapons inscribed with this powerful rune may cause a successful hit to blast outward, striking multiple enemies.
x2tagSkillRunesName005.name: Runeword: Explode

x2tagSkillRunesName006.description: Makes your strikes explode with intense heat, and projectiles break into burning fragments.
x2tagSkillRunesName006.name: Runeword: Burn

x2tagSkillRunesName007.description: This basic engraving reduces the weight of a weapon or shield, letting a Runemaster wield even heavy blades with grace and precision.
x2tagSkillRunesName007.name: Runeword: Feather

x2tagSkillRunesName008.description: Enchants a shield or a staff with the ability to absorb the energy of enemy blows and spells, adding it to your own.
x2tagSkillRunesName008.name: Runeword: Absorb

x2tagSkillRunesName009.description: Weave vast amounts of Energy into a layer of magical armor for yourself and nearby allies that protects against physical attacks.
x2tagSkillRunesName009.name: Energy Armor

x2tagSkillRunesName010.description: Those who follow the way of the Berserkir fight with the mind of an enraged animal, and will forego the tactical subtleties of a shield to wildly attack with weapons in both hands. {}{}Allows and requires dual wielding.
x2tagSkillRunesName010.name: Reckless Offense

x2tagSkillRunesName011.description: Cast the Rune of Life on yourself or allies to protect against dark magic and increase stamina.
x2tagSkillRunesName011.name: Rune of Life

x2tagSkillRunesName012.description: Cast a circle of defensive runes on the ground around you that will detonate if enemies step on them.
x2tagSkillRunesName012.name: Runic Mines

x2tagSkillRunesName013.description: Enhances the aspect of Cold on your Runic Mines, causing enemies to be slowed and frozen.
x2tagSkillRunesName013.name: Freezing Mines

x2tagSkillRunesName014.description: Take a few moments to draw an intricate sigil on the ground that will then explode with tremendous force.
x2tagSkillRunesName014.name: Seal of Fate

x2tagSkillRunesName015.description: The shock of the explosion leaves even those who survive battered and vulnerable.
x2tagSkillRunesName015.name: Aftershock

x2tagSkillRunesName016.description: In the rush of glorious combat, every strike you land pushes your mind further into an ecstatic state, increasing the force of all magical abilities.  {}{}Assign this skill to your left mouse button.
x2tagSkillRunesName016.name: Rune Weapon

x2tagSkillRunesName017.description: The power building up as you fight ignites your runed weapons with Elemental magic and strikes out at anyone who touches you.
x2tagSkillRunesName017.name: Magical Charge

x2tagSkillRunesName018.description: Advanced inscriptions on your weapon make it actively drain the enemy's energy, fueling your own while weakening their resolve.
x2tagSkillRunesName018.name: Energy Drain

x2tagSkillRunesName020.description: Being wounded in battle only accelerates your transition into a frenzy, making enemies who failed to land a killing blow soon regret the attempt. {}{}Remains active if health remains low.
x2tagSkillRunesName020.name: Sacred Rage

x2tagSkillRunesName021.description: Entering the state of rage lets out a terrifying scream that will send lesser enemies running.
x2tagSkillRunesName021.name: Frightening Power
